obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_226_0: * Ho ho ho^1, I'm an item!/
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_242_0: * (Looks like a dog slobbered on it)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_245_0: * (You'll croak before you can find the X^1! Signed^1, the Mad Croaker.)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_251_0: * (It's good you're spending points on this. They are good for anything else.)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_254_0: * (The aqua spirits trapped in the coolers are beautiful^1, and best of all^1, recyclable.)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_257_0: * (Don't let your guard down. That chair is going to kick your ass!)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_260_0: * (Sometimes you should take the spotlight if it heads your way. Don't be a coward!)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_263_0: * (These are the ranks^1, from lowest to highest...)/
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_264_0: * (C^1,B^1,A^1, S^1, and of course T^1, for TV.)/
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_265_0: * (T is just for bragging rights^1, so don't sweat it.)/
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_266_0: * (Anything lower than "C" is just asking for it...!)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_269_0: * (There are no weapons in the GAME. Kids and Adults can enjoy a like!)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_272_0: * (Kris felt a feeling of deja vu.)/
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_274_0: * (Kris felt a feeling of deja vu.)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_277_0: * (A musical island postcard from the FLYING ACES.)/
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_278_0: * (It's encouraging you to visit..^1. but the music gets old fast.)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_281_0: * (..^1. huh? There was some sort of triangle inside...)/
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_299_0: * (Guess it can go in your room...?)/%
obj_ch3_gachapon_slash_Draw_0_gml_308_0: * (..^1. did you get an item or not?)/%
